idea-plugin.name: Base16 Edge Light
idea-plugin.vendor: cjayross (https://github.com/cjayross), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Edge Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by cjayross (https://github.com/cjayross). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
